LicenseKeyBucketName.ConstraintDescription:
The bucket name can include numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase
letters, and hyphens (-). It cannot start or end with a hyphen (-)
LicenseKeyBucketName.Description: Name of S3 bucket containing license key to deploy

LicenseServerInstanceType.Description: AWS EC2 InstanceType for the LicenseServer instance

LicenseKeyBucketRegion.Description: The AWS Region where the S3 bucket containing the license key (LicenseKeyBucketName) is hosted.

LicenseKeyBucketPath.Description: Path to license key within the bucket

ContentInstanceType.Description: AWS EC2 InstanceType for the Content instance

EngineCount.Description: Number of Content engines to deploy

DAHInstanceType.Description: AWS EC2 InstanceType for the DAH instance

DIHInstanceType.Description: AWS EC2 InstanceType for the DIH instance

NiFiInstanceType.Description: AWS EC2 InstanceType for the NiFi instance

NiFiS3AccessKey.Description: AWS Access Key with access to S3 bucket

NiFiS3SecretKey.Description: AWS Secret Key with access to S3 bucket

StaticServersInstanceType.Description: AWS EC2 InstanceType for the static servers instance

GatewayProxyInstanceType.Description: AWS EC2 InstanceType for the Gateway Proxy instance

EmailAddress.Description: Value to use in the Email Address field of the self-signed certificate

Country.Description: Value to use in the Country field of the self-signed certificate

Locality.Description: Value to use in the Locality field of the self-signed certificate

StateProvinceCounty.Description: Value to use in the State/Province/County field of the self-signed certificate

Organisation.Description: Value to use in the Organisation field of the self-signed certificate

OrganisationalUnit.Description: Value to use in the Organisational Unit field of the self-signed certificate

VPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IPv4 CIDR with smallest block of /27
VPCCIDR.Description: The CIDR of the VPC. Smallest block /27; e.g. 172.16.0.0/27.

PublicSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IPv4 CIDR with smallest block of /28
PublicSubnetCIDR.Description: The CIDR of the Public Subnet. Subnet of VpcCIDR, disjoint of PrivateSubnetCIDR, smallest block /28 e.g. 172.16.0.0/28.

PrivateSubnetCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IPv4 CIDR with smallest block of /28
PrivateSubnetCIDR.Description: The CIDR of the Private Subnet. Subnet of VpcCIDR, disjoint of PublicSubnetCIDR, smallest block /28 e.g. 172.16.0.16/28.

PublicAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IPv4 CIDR
PublicAccessCIDR.Description: The CIDR of IP addresses allowed to access the "public" interfaces of the system

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow inbound traffic in PrivateSubnetCIDR on port 41200
Allow inbound traffic in PrivateSubnetCIDR on port 41202

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow inbound traffic in PublicSubnetCIDR on port 443

InitialPassword.Description: Initial password for Find and SiteAdmin
InitialPassword.Value: Initial admin password can be found on the IdolStaticServersInstance in /opt/community/random_password.txt
